We ❤ Open Source

About

Instead of working on a project for just one company, you'll contribute to Open Source Projects that are used by companies around the world. You'll collaborate with a group of students under the guidance of a professional mentor whose only job is to help you successfully contribute.

Start contributing to existing projects

Open Mindd current projects are based on current RHEL | Mobile | Web development Projects. We ❤ to hear your MINOR or MAJOR Project or any other ideas too
You can Kickstart with even a BLOG or LOGO.

Join the Discord Server and Get Started

Get in touch

Embracing an open source mindset is an invitation for innovation, and enables organisations to break free from proprietary vendors. There are commercial benefits across the board when vendors employ open thinking at all levels (open source, open standards, open APIs). The enterprise customer doesn’t have to be locked in, can access innovation across the community, and most importantly is able to quickly, and nimbly respond to ever changing market conditions.
